wikipedia_page.main: Lyndon Needs is a guitarist from South Wales. He is best known as lead guitarist of a Teddy Boy band Crazy Cavan and the Rhythm Rockers. Needs is a founding member of Crazy Cavan and the Rhythm Rockers and known as wildly extrovert showman guitarist. He has also made solo albums.

response: The first incarnation of the band was formed in Newport, South Wales, in 1964 by Cavan Grogan (vocals), Lyndon Needs (lead guitar) and Terry Walley (rhythm guitar) under the name "Screamin' Count Dracula and the Vampires".
